mapper.select: SELECT no AS memberNo, gradeId, orderCount FROM member WHERE no = #{memberNo}
SELECT s.orderNo, o.price, o.secPrice, o.orderType, o.deliveryPrice, s.feeAmount FROM settlement s INNER JOIN `order` o ON s.orderNo = o.orderNo WHERE s.settlementNo = #{settlementNo}
SELECT orderNo, memberNo, productNo, price, deliveryPrice, secPrice, orderType AS revenueType FROM `order` WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo}
